```py
>>> df1 = pd.DataFrame([[1, 2], [3, 4]], columns=['A', 'B'])
>>> store = pd.HDFStore("store.h5", 'w')  
>>> store.put('data', df1, format='table')  
>>> df2 = pd.DataFrame([[5, 6], [7, 8]], columns=['A', 'B'])
>>> store.append('data', df2)  
>>> store.close()  
>>> for group in store.walk():  
...     print(group)  
>>> store.close() 
```
